text: Chavalit Yongchaiyudh (, , ; born 15 May 1932), also known as "Big Jiew" (, , ), is a Thai politician and retired army officer. In 1990 he founded the New Aspiration Party which he led until 2002. He was Thailand's 22nd Prime Minister of Thailand from 1996 to 1997. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Thailand Category:Generals
title: Chavalit Yongchaiyudh
